action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of Tetris-like blocks in various colors such as red, purple, yellow, and orange, arranged in a scattered pattern on a white background. The shapes resemble the Tetrominoes used in the game of Tetris, with L-shaped, T-shaped, and line-shaped blocks.

DESCRIPTION: The image displays a collection of Tetris-like blocks in different colors. There are two blue blocks, one on the top right and one on the bottom left. There are also two grey blocks in the center, a green block in the middle right, and a small blue block in the top center. The blocks are arranged in a way that does not form a complete line and have a pixelated appearance.
